page.title: 15POPULATION OF HOCKWOLD
page.content: { {Hockwold-cum-Wilton}had a population of l049 at the last count in l983.Of these there are approx.290 retired,many of them living on the fairly new College Farm Estate.These are all bungalows and many of the residents have retired to Hockwold from London and other Towns attracted by the lower cost of living.There are at least 120 families receiving{Family {Allowance.}At the Primary School there are approx.82 pupils of these 7 receive free school meals.At 11 the children go to Methwold School by bus (16 went in l984,16 in l985).There are approx. 46{American families}living in the village.10 of these own their own houses,the others rent them.
